meta.title: Home - Oak Lawn - Hometown School District 123

meta.content: District 123 is a K-8 district located in Oak Lawn and Hometown, Illinois. The district is composed of one middle school and five elementary schools with a total student enrollment of 3,150 students.

meta.name: twitter:description
meta.content: District 123 is a K-8 district located in Oak Lawn and Hometown, Illinois. The district is composed of one middle school and five elementary schools with a total student enrollment of 3,150 students.
